BUG_REPORT.Title: ZIP field accepts more than 5 digits
BUG_REPORT.Precondition: web site www.....com is open" "all fields empty"
BUG_REPORT.Steps_to_reproduce: paste “12345678” into ZIP filed, for example by creating a txt file with 12345678 string, copying it from there and pasting into the field
BUG_REPORT.Expected_result: The ZIP field only accepts the first 5 digits
BUG_REPORT.Actual_result: The ZIP field accepts the All 8 digits
